lines.text: Mind you, I admit he's a good singer, but there's somethin' lacking... He hasn't got that certain 'ny-aah' in his voice.
Now there's a 'ny-aah' for you in all its glory... and til he has that, he'll never be a great singer.
Sure, Peter, the world lost a glorious voice when the heart of Sean o'Carolan was broken!
